description: Google Super App combines all Google services including Drive, Calendar, Gmail, Sheets, Analytics, Ads, and more, providing a unified platform for seamless integration and management of your digital life.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_ACL_PATCH
capabilities.description: Updates an access control rule for a calendar using patch semantics (partial update). This allows modifying specific fields without affecting other properties. Note: Each patch request consumes three quota units. For domain-type ACL rules, if PATCH fails with 500 error, this action will automatically fallback to UPDATE method.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_ADD_ENRICHMENT
capabilities.description: Adds an enrichment at a specified position in a defined album.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_ADD_FILE_SHARING_PREFERENCE
capabilities.description: Modifies sharing permissions for an existing Google Drive file, granting a specified role to a user, group, domain, or 'anyone'.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_ADD_LABEL_TO_EMAIL
capabilities.description: Adds and/or removes specified Gmail labels for a message; ensure `message_id` and all `label_ids` are valid (use 'listLabels' for custom label IDs).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_ADD_OR_REMOVE_TO_CUSTOMER_LIST
capabilities.description: AddOrRemoveToCustomerList Tool will add a contact to a customer list in Google Ads. Note: It takes 6 to 12 hours for changes to be reflected in the customer list.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_ADD_SHEET
capabilities.description: Adds a new sheet (worksheet) to a spreadsheet. Use this tool to create a new tab within an existing Google Sheet, optionally specifying its title, index, size, and other properties. IMPORTANT: - Always provide the spreadsheetId. Use 'Search Spreadsheets' action if you need to find it by name - Sheet names must be unique within the spreadsheet - For tab colors, use EITHER rgbColor OR themeColor, never both - Index must be less than or equal to the current number of sheets - CONCURRENCY WARNING: Do not use 'index' when creating multiple sheets in parallel - this causes 'index is too high' errors. For parallel creation, omit the index field and let sheets be added at the end Common use cases: - Add a new sheet with a specific name - Insert a sheet at a specific position - Create a sheet with custom colors and formatting

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_AGGREGATE_COLUMN_DATA
capabilities.description: Searches for rows where a specific column matches a value and performs mathematical operations on data from another column.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_APPEND_DIMENSION
capabilities.description: Tool to append new rows or columns to a sheet, increasing its size. Use when you need to add empty rows or columns to an existing sheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_ADD_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Adds one or more media items to an album in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_CREATE_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Unified action to upload media files and create them as items in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_DELETE_MESSAGES
capabilities.description: Tool to permanently delete multiple Gmail messages in bulk. Use when you need to efficiently remove large numbers of emails (e.g., retention enforcement, mailbox hygiene).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_GET
capabilities.description: Retrieves data from specified cell ranges in a Google Spreadsheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_GET_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Returns the list of media items for the specified media item identifiers.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_MODIFY_MESSAGES
capabilities.description: Modify labels on multiple Gmail messages in one efficient API call. Supports up to 1,000 messages per request for bulk operations like archiving, marking as read/unread, or applying custom labels.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_RUN_REPORTS
capabilities.description: Tool to return multiple analytics data reports in a batch. Use when you need to fetch multiple reports for one GA4 property in a single request.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_UPDATE
capabilities.description: Updates a specified range in a Google Sheet with given values, or appends them as new rows if `first_cell_location` is omitted. Auto-expands grid for large datasets, preventing range errors. Requirements: Target sheet must exist and spreadsheet must contain at least one worksheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_BATCH_UPDATE_VALUES_BY_DATA_FILTER
capabilities.description: Tool to update values in ranges matching data filters. Use when you need to update specific data in a Google Sheet based on criteria rather than fixed cell ranges.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CALENDAR_LIST_INSERT
capabilities.description: Inserts an existing calendar into the user's calendar list.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CALENDAR_LIST_UPDATE
capabilities.description: Updates an existing entry on the user\'s calendar list.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CALENDARS_DELETE
capabilities.description: Deletes a secondary calendar. Use calendars.clear for clearing all events on primary calendars.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CALENDARS_UPDATE
capabilities.description: Updates metadata for a calendar.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CHECK_COMPATIBILITY
capabilities.description: Tool to list dimensions and metrics compatible with a GA4 report request. Use when you need to validate compatibility of chosen dimensions or metrics before running a report.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CLEAR_BASIC_FILTER
capabilities.description: Tool to clear the basic filter from a sheet. Use when you need to remove an existing basic filter from a specific sheet within a Google Spreadsheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CLEAR_CALENDAR
capabilities.description: Clears a primary calendar. This operation deletes all events associated with the primary calendar of an account.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CLEAR_TASKS
capabilities.description: Permanently clears all completed tasks from a specified Google Tasks list; this action is destructive and idempotent.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CLEAR_VALUES
capabilities.description: Clears cell content (preserving formatting and notes) from a specified A1 notation range in a Google Spreadsheet; the range must correspond to an existing sheet and cells.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_COMPUTE_ROUTE_MATRIX
capabilities.description: Calculates travel distance and duration matrix between multiple origins and destinations using the modern Routes API; supports OAuth2 authentication and various travel modes.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_COPY_DOCUMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to create a copy of an existing Google Document. Use this to duplicate a document, for example, when using an existing document as a template. The copied document will have a default title (e.g., 'Copy of [original title]') if no new title is provided, and will be placed in the user's root Google Drive folder.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_COPY_FILE
capabilities.description: Duplicates an existing file in Google Drive, identified by its `file_id`.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_ALBUM
capabilities.description: Creates a new album in Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_AUDIENCE_EXPORT
capabilities.description: Tool to create an audience export. Use after configuring the audience and dimensions to produce a long-running Operation.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_AUDIENCE_LIST
capabilities.description: Tool to create an audience list. Use when you need to define and asynchronously populate a new AudienceList resource under a GA4 property.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_CHART
capabilities.description: Create a chart in a Google Sheets spreadsheet using the specified data range and chart type. Conditional requirements: - Provide either a simple chart via chart_type + data_range (basicChart), OR supply a full chart_spec supporting all chart types. Exactly one approach should be used. - When using chart_spec, set exactly one of the union fields (basicChart | pieChart | bubbleChart | candlestickChart | histogramChart | waterfallChart | treemapChart | orgChart | scorecardChart).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to create a comment on a file. Use when you need to add a new comment to a specific file in Google Drive.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_CUSTOMER_LIST
capabilities.description: CreateCustomerList Tool will create a customer list in Google Ads.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_DOCUMENT
capabilities.description: Creates a new Google Docs document using the provided title as filename and inserts the initial text at the beginning if non-empty, returning the document's ID and metadata (excluding body content).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_DOCUMENT_MARKDOWN
capabilities.description: Creates a new Google Docs document, optionally initializing it with a title and content provided as Markdown text.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_DRIVE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new shared drive. Use when you need to programmatically create a new shared drive for collaboration or storage.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_EMAIL_DRAFT
capabilities.description: Creates a Gmail email draft, requiring at least one of recipient_email, cc, or bcc must be provided. Atleast one of subject or body must be provided. Supports To/Cc/Bcc, subject, plain/HTML body (ensure `is_html=True` for HTML), attachments, and threading. When creating a draft reply to an existing thread (thread_id provided), leave subject empty to stay in the same thread; setting a subject will create a NEW thread instead.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_EVENT
capabilities.description: Create a Google Calendar event using `start_datetime` plus `event_duration_hour` and `event_duration_minutes` fields to derive the end time. Requires calendar write access. The organizer is added as an attendee unless `exclude_organizer` is True. Example request to create event for 1 hour 30 minutes: { "calendar_id": "primary", "start_datetime": "2025-01-16T13:00:00", "timezone": "America/New_York", "event_duration_hour": 1, "event_duration_minutes": 30, "summary": "Client sync", "attendees": [{"email": "guest@example.com"}] }

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_EXPANDED_DATA_SET
capabilities.description: Tool to create an expanded data set for a property. Use when you need to combine specific dimensions and metrics into a custom dataset after property creation.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_FILE
capabilities.description: Creates a new file or folder with metadata. Use to create empty files or folders, or files with content by providing it in the request body (though this action primarily focuses on metadata creation).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_FILE_FROM_TEXT
capabilities.description: Creates a new file in Google Drive from provided text content (up to 10MB), supporting various formats including automatic conversion to Google Workspace types.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Creates a new folder in Google Drive, optionally within a parent folder specified by its ID or name; if a parent name is provided but not found, the action will fail.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_FOOTER
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new footer in a Google Document. Use when you need to add a footer, optionally specifying its type and the section it applies to.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_FOOTNOTE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new footnote in a Google Document. Use this when you need to add a footnote at a specific location or at the end of the document body.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_GOOGLE_SHEET1
capabilities.description: Creates a new Google Spreadsheet in Google Drive using the provided title.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_HEADER
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new header in a Google Document. Use this tool when you need to add a header to a document, optionally specifying the section it applies to.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_LABEL
capabilities.description: Creates a new label with a unique name in the specified user's Gmail account.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_MEET
capabilities.description: Creates a new Google Meet space, optionally configuring its access type and entry point access controls.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_NAMED_RANGE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new named range in a Google Document. Use this to assign a name to a specific part of the document for easier reference or programmatic manipulation.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_PARAGRAPH_BULLETS
capabilities.description: Tool to add bullets to paragraphs within a specified range in a Google Document. Use when you need to format a list or a set of paragraphs as bullet points.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_REPLY
capabilities.description: Tool to create a reply to a comment in Google Drive. Use when you need to respond to an existing comment on a file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_ROLLUP_PROPERTY
capabilities.description: Tool to create a GA4 Roll-up Property and optionally initial source links.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_SHORTCUT_TO_FILE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a shortcut to a file or folder in Google Drive. Use when you need to link to an existing Drive item from another location without duplicating it.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_SPREADSHEET_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Creates a new column in a Google Spreadsheet, requiring a valid `spreadsheet_id` and an existing `sheet_id`; an out-of-bounds `insert_index` may append/prepend the column.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_SPREADSHEET_ROW
capabilities.description: Inserts a new, empty row into a specified sheet of a Google Spreadsheet at a given index, optionally inheriting formatting from the row above.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_CREATE_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Creates a new task list with the specified title.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Deletes a comment from a file. Use when you need to remove a specific comment from a Google Drive file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_CONTENT_RANGE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a range of content from a Google Document. Use when you need to remove a specific portion of text or other structural elements within a document.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_DIMENSION
capabilities.description: Tool to delete specified rows or columns from a sheet in a Google Spreadsheet. Use when you need to remove a range of rows or columns.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_DRAFT
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a specific Gmail draft using its ID; ensure the draft exists and the user has necessary permissions for the given `user_id`.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_DRIVE
capabilities.description: Tool to permanently delete a shared drive. Use when you need to remove a shared drive and its contents (if specified).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_EVENT
capabilities.description: Deletes a specified event by `event_id` from a Google Calendar (`calendar_id`); this action is idempotent and raises a 404 error if the event is not found.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_FOOTER
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a footer from a Google Document. Use when you need to remove a footer from a specific section or the default footer.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_HEADER
capabilities.description: Deletes the header from the specified section or the default header if no section is specified. Use this tool to remove a header from a Google Document.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a specific email message by its ID from a Gmail mailbox; for `user_id`, use 'me' for the authenticated user or an email address to which the authenticated user has delegated access.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_NAMED_RANGE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a named range from a Google Document. Use when you need to remove a previously defined named range by its ID or name.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_PARAGRAPH_BULLETS
capabilities.description: Tool to remove bullets from paragraphs within a specified range in a Google Document. Use when you need to clear bullet formatting from a section of a document.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_PERMISSION
capabilities.description: Deletes a permission from a file by permission ID. Use when you need to revoke access for a specific user or group from a file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_REPLY
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific reply by reply ID. Use when you need to remove a reply from a comment on a file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_SHEET
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a sheet (worksheet) from a spreadsheet. Use when you need to remove a specific sheet from a Google Sheet document.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_TABLE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an entire table from a Google Document. Use when you have the document ID and the specific start and end index of the table element to be removed. The table's range can be found by inspecting the document's content structure.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_TABLE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a column from a table in a Google Document. Use this tool when you need to remove a specific column from an existing table within a document.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_TABLE_ROW
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a row from a table in a Google Document. Use when you need to remove a specific row from an existing table.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_TASK
capabilities.description: Deletes a specified task from a given task list in Google Tasks.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DELETE_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes an existing Google Task list, identified by `tasklist_id`, along with all its tasks; this operation is irreversible.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DISTANCE_MATRIX_API
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Legacy API that calculates travel distance and time for a matrix of origins and destinations. This API only works with API keys (no OAuth2 support). Use the modern 'Compute Route Matrix' action instead, which supports OAuth2 authentication. Supports different modes of transportation and options like departure/arrival times.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DOWNLOAD_FILE
capabilities.description: Downloads a file from Google Drive by its ID. For Google Workspace documents (Docs, Sheets, Slides), optionally exports to a specified `mime_type`. For other file types, downloads in their native format regardless of mime_type. Examples: Export a Google Doc to plain text: {"file_id": "1N2o5xQWmAbCdEfGhIJKlmnOPq", "mime_type": "text/plain"} Download a Google Sheet as CSV: {"file_id": "1ZyXwVuTsRqPoNmLkJiHgFeDcB", "mime_type": "text/csv"}

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_DUPLICATE_CALENDAR
capabilities.description: Creates a new, empty Google Calendar with the specified title (summary).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_EDIT_FILE
capabilities.description: Updates an existing Google Drive file by overwriting its entire content with new text (max 10MB). This action allows users to change the content of a Drive file, ensuring that the latest updates are saved and available without creating a new file. Users can specify different MIME types for the content being uploaded, facilitating various file formats.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_EMPTY_TRASH
capabilities.description: Tool to permanently delete all of the user's trashed files. Use when you want to empty the trash in Google Drive. This action allows you to permanently remove all files that are currently in the trash of Google Drive. It can be applied to files in both the user's root trash and shared drives, ensuring a complete removal of unwanted files.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_EVENTS_INSTANCES
capabilities.description: Returns instances of the specified recurring event.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_EVENTS_LIST
capabilities.description: Returns events on the specified calendar.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_EVENTS_MOVE
capabilities.description: Moves an event to another calendar, i.e., changes an event's organizer.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_EVENTS_WATCH
capabilities.description: Watch for changes to Events resources.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_EXECUTE_SQL
capabilities.description: Execute SQL queries against Google Sheets tables. Supports SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE operations with familiar SQL syntax. Tables are automatically detected and mapped from the spreadsheet structure.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FETCH_EMAILS
capabilities.description: Fetches a list of email messages from a Gmail account, supporting filtering, pagination, and optional full content retrieval.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FETCH_MESSAGE_BY_MESSAGE_ID
capabilities.description: Fetches a specific email message by its ID, provided the `message_id` exists and is accessible to the authenticated `user_id`.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FETCH_MESSAGE_BY_THREAD_ID
capabilities.description: Retrieves messages from a Gmail thread using its `thread_id`, where the thread must be accessible by the specified `user_id`.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FILES_MODIFY_LABELS
capabilities.description: Modifies the set of labels applied to a file. Returns a list of the labels that were added or modified. Use when you need to programmatically change labels on a Google Drive file, such as adding, updating, or removing them.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FIND_EVENT
capabilities.description: Finds events in a specified Google Calendar using text query, time ranges (event start/end, last modification), and event types; ensure `timeMin` is not chronologically after `timeMax` if both are provided.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FIND_FILE
capabilities.description: The comprehensive Google Drive search tool that handles all file and folder discovery needs. Use this for any file finding task - from simple name searches to complex queries with date filters, MIME types, permissions, custom properties, folder scoping, and more. Searches across My Drive and shared drives with full metadata support. Examples: - Find PDFs: q="mimeType = 'application/pdf'" - Find recent files: q="modifiedTime > '2024-01-01T00:00:00'" - Search by name: q="name contains 'report'" - Files in folder: folderId="abc123" or q="'FOLDER_ID' in parents"

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FIND_FOLDER
capabilities.description: Tool to find a folder in Google Drive by its name and optionally a parent folder. Use when you need to locate a specific folder to perform further actions like creating files in it or listing its contents.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FIND_FREE_SLOTS
capabilities.description: Finds both free and busy time slots in Google Calendars for specified calendars within a defined time range (defaults to the current day UTC if `time_min`/`time_max` are omitted). Returns busy intervals enriched with event details and calculates free slots by finding gaps between busy periods; `time_min` must precede `time_max` if both are provided. This action retrieves free and busy time slots for the specified calendars over a given time period. It analyzes the busy intervals from the calendars and provides calculated free slots based on the gaps in the busy periods.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FIND_REPLACE
capabilities.description: Tool to find and replace text in a Google Spreadsheet. Use when you need to fix formula errors, update values, or perform bulk text replacements across cells. Common use cases: - Fix #ERROR! cells by replacing with empty string or correct formula - Update old values with new ones across multiple cells - Fix formula references or patterns - Clean up data formatting issues

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FIND_WORKSHEET_BY_TITLE
capabilities.description: Finds a worksheet by its exact, case-sensitive title within a Google Spreadsheet; returns a boolean indicating if found and the complete metadata of the entire spreadsheet, regardless of whether the target worksheet is found.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FORMAT_CELL
capabilities.description: Applies text and background cell formatting to a specified range in a Google Sheets worksheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FORWARD_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Forward an existing Gmail message to specified recipients, preserving original body and attachments.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_FREE_BUSY_QUERY
capabilities.description: Returns free/busy information for a set of calendars.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GENERATE_IDS
capabilities.description: Generates a set of file IDs which can be provided in create or copy requests. Use when you need to pre-allocate IDs for new files or copies.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GEOCODING_API
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Legacy API to convert addresses into geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude) and vice versa (reverse geocoding), or get an address for a Place ID. This API only works with API keys (no OAuth2 support). Consider using the modern Places API (Text Search or Nearby Search) for similar functionality with OAuth2 authentication.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_ABOUT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve information about the user, the user's Drive, and system capabilities. Use when you need to check storage quotas, user details, or supported import/export formats.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_ACCOUNT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a single Account by its resource name. Use when you need detailed account info after confirming the account resource name (e.g., accounts/100).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_ALBUM
capabilities.description: Returns the album based on the specified albumId.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_ATTACHMENT
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific attachment by ID from a message in a user's Gmail mailbox, requiring valid message and attachment IDs.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_AUDIENCE_EXPORT
capabilities.description: Tool to get configuration metadata for an Audience Export. Use after creating an Audience Export to retrieve its status and details.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_AUDIENCE_LIST
capabilities.description: Tool to get configuration metadata about a specific audience list. Use after confirming the audience list resource name.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CALENDAR
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific Google Calendar, identified by `calendar_id`, to which the authenticated user has access.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CAMPAIGN_BY_ID
capabilities.description: GetCampaignById Tool will return details of a campaign in Google Ads.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CAMPAIGN_BY_NAME
capabilities.description: GetCampaignByName Tool will run a SQL GetCampaignByName in Google Ads.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CHANGES_START_PAGE_TOKEN
capabilities.description: Tool to get the starting pageToken for listing future changes in Google Drive. Use this when you need to track changes to files and folders.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CHARTS_FROM_SPREADSHEET
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of all charts from a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet. Use when you need to get chart IDs and their specifications for embedding or referencing elsewhere, such as in Google Docs.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to get a comment by ID. Use when you need to retrieve a specific comment from a Google Drive file and have both the file ID and comment ID.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CONFERENCE_RECORD_FOR_MEET
capabilities.description: Get conference record

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CONTACTS
capabilities.description: Fetches contacts (connections) for the authenticated Google account, allowing selection of specific data fields and pagination.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CURRENT_DATE_TIME
capabilities.description: Gets the current date and time, allowing for a specific timezone offset.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_CUSTOMER_LISTS
capabilities.description: GetCustomerLists Tool will list all customer lists in Google Ads.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_DIRECTION
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Legacy API that fetches detailed directions between an origin and a destination, supporting intermediate waypoints and various travel modes. This API only works with API keys (no OAuth2 support). Use the modern 'Get Route' action instead, which supports OAuth2 authentication.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_DOCUMENT_BY_ID
capabilities.description: Retrieves an existing Google Document by its ID; will error if the document is not found.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_DRIVE
capabilities.description: Tool to get a shared drive by ID. Use when you need to retrieve information about a specific shared drive.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_FILE_METADATA
capabilities.description: Tool to get a file's metadata by ID. Use when you need to retrieve the metadata for a specific file in Google Drive.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_KEY_EVENT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a Key Event. Use after confirming the key event resource name.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_MEDIA_ITEM_DOWNLOAD
capabilities.description: Downloads a media item from Google Photos and returns it as a file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_MEET
capabilities.description: Retrieve details of a Google Meet space using its unique identifier.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_METADATA
capabilities.description: Tool to get metadata for dimensions, metrics, and comparisons for a GA4 property. Use when you need to discover available fields before building a report.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_PARTICIPANT_SESSION
capabilities.description: Tool to get a specific participant session from a conference record. Use when you need to retrieve details about a particular participant in a past meeting.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_PEOPLE
capabilities.description: Retrieves either a specific person's details (using `resource_name`) or lists 'Other Contacts' (if `other_contacts` is true), with `person_fields` specifying the data to return.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_PERMISSION
capabilities.description: Gets a permission by ID. Use this tool to retrieve a specific permission for a file or shared drive.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_PROFILE
capabilities.description: Retrieves key Gmail profile information (email address, message/thread totals, history ID) for a user.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_PROPERTY_QUOTAS_SNAPSHOT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all property quotas organized by category for a given property. Use when you need to check current quota usage for a GA4 property.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_RECORDINGS_BY_CONFERENCE_RECORD_ID
capabilities.description: Retrieves recordings from Google Meet for a given conference record ID.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_REPLY
capabilities.description: Tool to get a specific reply to a comment on a file. Use when you need to retrieve the details of a particular reply.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_REVISION
capabilities.description: Tool to get a specific revision's metadata by revision ID. Use when you need to retrieve information about a particular version of a file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_ROUTE
capabilities.description: Calculates one or more routes between two specified locations. Uses various travel modes and preferences; addresses must be resolvable by Google Maps.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_SHEET_NAMES
capabilities.description: Lists all worksheet names from a specified Google Spreadsheet (which must exist), useful for discovering sheets before further operations.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_SPREADSHEET_BY_DATA_FILTER
capabilities.description: Returns the spreadsheet at the given ID, filtered by the specified data filters. Use this tool when you need to retrieve specific subsets of data from a Google Sheet based on criteria like A1 notation, developer metadata, or grid ranges.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_SPREADSHEET_INFO
capabilities.description: Retrieves comprehensive metadata for a Google Spreadsheet using its ID, excluding cell data.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_TABLE_SCHEMA
capabilities.description: This action is used to get the schema of a table in a Google Spreadsheet, call this action to get the schema of a table in a spreadsheet BEFORE YOU QUERY THE TABLE. Analyze table structure and infer column names, types, and constraints. Uses statistical analysis of sample data to determine the most likely data type for each column. Call this action after calling the LIST_TABLES action to get the schema of a table in a spreadsheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_TASK
capabilities.description: Use to retrieve a specific Google Task if its `task_id` and parent `tasklist_id` are known.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific task list from the user's Google Tasks if the `tasklist_id` exists for the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GET_TRANSCRIPTS_BY_CONFERENCE_RECORD_ID
capabilities.description: Retrieves all transcripts for a specific Google Meet conference using its conferenceRecord_id.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_GOOGLE_DRIVE_DELETE_FOLDER_OR_FILE_ACTION
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a file or folder in Google Drive. Use when you need to permanently remove a specific file or folder using its ID. Note: This action is irreversible.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_HIDE_DRIVE
capabilities.description: Tool to hide a shared drive from the default view. Use when you want to remove a shared drive from the user's main Google Drive interface without deleting it.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_INSERT_DIMENSION
capabilities.description: Tool to insert new rows or columns into a sheet at a specified location. Use when you need to add empty rows or columns within an existing Google Sheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_INSERT_INLINE_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to insert an image from a given URI at a specified location in a Google Document as an inline image. Use when you need to add an image to a document programmatically.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_INSERT_PAGE_BREAK
capabilities.description: Tool to insert a page break into a Google Document. Use when you need to start new content on a fresh page, such as at the end of a chapter or section.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_INSERT_TABLE_ACTION
capabilities.description: Tool to insert a table into a Google Document. Use when you need to add a new table at a specific location or at the end of a segment (like document body, header, or footer) in a document.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_INSERT_TABLE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Tool to insert a new column into a table in a Google Document. Use this tool when you need to add a column to an existing table at a specific location.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_INSERT_TASK
capabilities.description: Creates a new task in a given `tasklist_id`, optionally as a subtask of an existing `task_parent` or positioned after an existing `task_previous` sibling, where both `task_parent` and `task_previous` must belong to the same `tasklist_id` if specified. IMPORTANT: Date fields (due, completed) accept various formats like '28 Sep 2025', '11:59 PM, 22 Sep 2025', or ISO format '2025-09-21T15:30:00Z' and will automatically convert them to RFC3339 format required by the API.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_INSERT_TEXT_ACTION
capabilities.description: Tool to insert a string of text at a specified location within a Google Document. Use when you need to add new text content to an existing document.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_ACCOUNTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all Accounts accessible by the caller. Use when you need to enumerate all Google Analytics accounts your credentials can access.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_ACL_RULES
capabilities.description: Retrieves the list of access control rules (ACLs) for a specified calendar, providing the necessary 'rule_id' values required for updating specific ACL rules.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_ALBUMS
capabilities.description: Lists all albums shown to a user in the Albums tab of Google Photos.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_AUDIENCE_EXPORTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all audience exports for a GA4 property. Use when you need to fetch its export history after initiating exports.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_AUDIENCE_LISTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all audience lists for a GA4 property. Use when you need to retrieve a property's configured audience lists after confirming the property ID.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_AUDIENCES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all audiences on a property. Use when you need to fetch all audiences for a GA4 property after confirming its existence.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_CALENDARS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a paginated list of calendars from the user's calendar list, with optional filtering and sync capabilities.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_CHANGES
capabilities.description: Tool to list the changes for a user or shared drive. Use when you need to track modifications to files and folders, such as creations, deletions, or permission changes. This action requires a `pageToken` which can be initially obtained using the `get_changes_start_page_token` action or from a previous `LIST_CHANGES` response. Example usage: ```json { "pageSize": 100, "includeRemoved": true } ``` Returns changes with timestamps, file IDs, and modification details. Save the `newStartPageToken` from the response to monitor future changes efficiently.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_COMMENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all comments for a file in Google Drive. Use when you need to retrieve comments associated with a specific file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_CONFERENCE_RECORDS
capabilities.description: Tool to list conference records. Use when you need to retrieve a list of past conferences, optionally filtering them by criteria like meeting code, space name, or time range.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_DRAFTS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a paginated list of email drafts from a user's Gmail account. Use verbose=true to get full draft details including subject, body, sender, and timestamp.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_FILE_LABELS
capabilities.description: Tool to list the labels on a file. Use when you need to retrieve all labels associated with a specific file in Google Drive.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_FILES
capabilities.description: Tool to list a user's files and folders in Google Drive. Use this to search or browse for files and folders based on various criteria.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_HISTORY
capabilities.description: Tool to list Gmail mailbox change history since a known startHistoryId. Use when performing incremental mailbox syncs to fetch only new changes.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_KEY_EVENTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list Key Events. Use when you need to retrieve all key event definitions for a given property.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_LABELS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of all system and user-created labels for the specified Gmail account.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_MEDIA_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Lists all media items from a user's Google Photos library.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_PARTICIPANT_SESSIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all participant sessions for a specific conference record in Google Meet. Use this when you need to retrieve a list of participants who joined a particular meeting.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_PERMISSIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list a file's permissions. Use when you need to retrieve all permissions associated with a specific file or shared drive.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_PROPERTIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list GA4 properties under a specific account. Use after obtaining an account ID; supports pagination and including soft-deleted properties.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_REPLIES_TO_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to list replies to a comment in Google Drive. Use this when you need to retrieve all replies associated with a specific comment on a file.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_REPORTING_DATA_ANNOTATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all Reporting Data Annotations on a property. Use when you need to retrieve or inspect annotations for a GA4 property.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_REVISIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list a file's revisions. Use when you need to retrieve the revision history of a specific file in Google Drive.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_ROLLUP_PROPERTIES
capabilities.description: Tool to list roll-up GA4 properties accessible to the caller. Use when you need to identify roll-up properties across all accessible accounts.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_SEARCH_ADS360_LINKS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all SearchAds360Links on a property. Use when you need to fetch all Search Ads 360 links for a given property after authenticating.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_SHARED_DRIVES
capabilities.description: Tool to list the user's shared drives. Use when you need to get a list of all shared drives accessible to the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_SPREADSHEET_CHARTS_ACTION
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of charts with their IDs and metadata from a Google Sheets spreadsheet. Use to identify charts available for embedding into Google Docs.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_TABLES
capabilities.description: This action is used to list all tables in a Google Spreadsheet, call this action to get the list of tables in a spreadsheet. Discover all tables in a Google Spreadsheet by analyzing sheet structure and detecting data patterns. Uses heuristic analysis to find header rows, data boundaries, and table structures.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_TASK_LISTS
capabilities.description: Fetches the authenticated user's task lists from Google Tasks; results may be paginated.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_TASKS
capabilities.description: Retrieves tasks from a Google Tasks list; all date/time strings must be RFC3339 UTC, and `showCompleted` must be true if `completedMin` or `completedMax` are specified.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LIST_THREADS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of email threads from a Gmail account, identified by `user_id` (email address or 'me'), supporting filtering and pagination.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_LOOKUP_SPREADSHEET_ROW
capabilities.description: Finds the first row in a Google Spreadsheet where a cell's entire content exactly matches the query string, searching within a specified A1 notation range or the first sheet by default.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_MAPS_EMBED_API
capabilities.description: Tool to generate an embeddable Google Map URL and HTML iframe code. Use when you need to display a map (place, view, directions, street view, search) on a webpage without JavaScript. Note: This API only works with API keys (no OAuth2 support). It generates embed URLs and does not make direct API calls.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_MODIFY_THREAD_LABELS
capabilities.description: Adds or removes specified existing label IDs from a Gmail thread, affecting all its messages; ensure the thread ID is valid.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_MOVE_FILE
capabilities.description: Tool to move a file from one folder to another in Google Drive. Use when you need to reorganize files by changing their parent folder(s).

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_MOVE_TASK
capabilities.description: Moves the specified task to another position in the destination task list.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_MOVE_TO_TRASH
capabilities.description: Moves an existing, non-deleted email message to the trash for the specified user.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_NEARBY_SEARCH
capabilities.description: Searches for places (e.g., restaurants, parks) within a specified circular area, with options to filter by place types and customize the returned fields and number of results.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_PARSE_FILE
capabilities.description: DEPRECATED: Exports Google Workspace files (max 10MB) to a specified format using `mime_type`, or downloads other file types; use `GOOGLEDRIVE_DOWNLOAD_FILE` instead.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_PATCH_CALENDAR
capabilities.description: Partially updates (PATCHes) an existing Google Calendar, modifying only the fields provided; `summary` is mandatory and cannot be an empty string, and an empty string for `description` or `location` clears them.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_PATCH_EVENT
capabilities.description: Update specified fields of an existing event in a Google Calendar using patch semantics (array fields like `attendees` are fully replaced if provided); ensure the `calendar_id` and `event_id` are valid and the user has write access to the calendar.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_PATCH_LABEL
capabilities.description: Patches the specified label.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_PATCH_TASK
capabilities.description: Partially updates an existing task (identified by `task_id`) within a specific Google Task list (identified by `tasklist_id`), modifying only the provided attributes from `TaskInput` (e.g., `title`, `notes`, `due` date, `status`) and requiring both the task and list to exist.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_PATCH_TASK_LIST
capabilities.description: Updates the title of an existing Google Tasks task list.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_QUERY_AUDIENCE_EXPORT
capabilities.description: Tool to query a completed audience export. Use when you need to fetch user rows with pagination.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_QUERY_AUDIENCE_LIST
capabilities.description: Tool to query an audience list. Use when you need to retrieve user rows from a GA4 audience list with pagination.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_QUERY_TABLE
capabilities.description: This action is used to query a table in a Google Spreadsheet, call this action to query a table in a spreadsheet. Execute SQL-like SELECT queries against spreadsheet tables. Supports WHERE conditions, ORDER BY, LIMIT clauses. Call this action after calling the GET_TABLE_SCHEMA action to query a table in a spreadsheet.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_QUICK_ADD
capabilities.description: Parses natural language text to quickly create a basic Google Calendar event with its title, date, and time, suitable for simple scheduling; does not support direct attendee addition or recurring events, and `calendar_id` must be valid if not 'primary'.

capabilities.name: GOOGLESUPER_REMOVE_ATTENDEE
capabilities.description: Removes an attendee from a specified event in a Google Calendar; the calendar and event must exist.
